content: Have you enabled sync on the sent mail folder. Select Account > manage folders > sent mail: Enable sync = on
creator: platform34

content: Sorry but there is no "sync" showing in the sent/ folders. Are you thinking of Tbird for Win 10+. I am talking of tbird android mobile. This seems to be a total mess and is different from the pc version. I am running Android 13
creator: AEdw

content:
Hi Alan

Yes, i'm discussing Thunderbird / K-9 for android.

1. Press the menu button (top left of app) to show the slide out account list. 2. Select your applicable email account. 3. Press "manage folders" (bottom left of account list). 4. Press the "sent mail" folder icon. 5. Toggle "Enable Sync" if it's not enabled.
creator: platform34

content:
Sorry. I thought i would look in the sent folder But the sync option only appears in the inbox folder. Any way, it is on 

My recently sent email now seems ok, but everything else has disappereared.

Alan
creator: AEdw
